description:
As many others in the comments I suddenly lost this tool I used a lot after updating. At this page it is described why and how to get it back: https://ubuntuhandbook.org/index.php/2022/04/get-back-gnome-screenshot-ubuntu-2204/

tl;dr: sudo apt install gnome-screenshot
I love its simplicity to use. Works every time and smoothly executed.
summary: Simplicity at its best! Only take a minute to learn

description: When your select a area to screenshot, or take a screenshot would be great a option to back to start page, when you miss the area of screenshot you want, you have to close and open again, or even you forgot you forgot you use two monitors and take standard option, or even take more than one screenshot.
cant find it anymore with new update
It's a very handy tool!
Works to specification, no complaints, very easy to use.
This is simple, works good and every time so far.  Way better than having to paste into a third party app to then save it. Makes webinar and video conf, etc. much more productive!
But it hangs often, after taking snapshot takes too longer time to generate a snapshot.
It's fine for taking screenshots, but lacks annotation, which would have made it perfect. Pretty sluggish at times.
summary: Works fine for what it is, could be better

description: Very intuitive and convenient. I love it!
Use this so often and it has never failed me yet.
A way to drop current screen shot and return to initial screen would be useful.
After taking a screenshot I have to close and reopen to take another screenshot. I would be nice if I could continue to use the app repeatedly.

It is good in everything but one thing to advise is to "add setting or properties". I normally use this by "click icon, click third option of 'select area to grab' ". But if I could set default option of this, I might skip one redundant operation whenever I use this.
summary: good, recommneded but need some upgrads

So that you can add arrows or mark things fast and easy. That is just wishful thinking though. For what the app is and does it has never let me down. Great software.

I've checked its content. it was awesome for taking screenshots!.

Regards,

Hassan Rasouli, Iran

After capturing the screen or a portion thereof, there is an EXTRA STEP to Copy to Clipboard the image content, i.e. to press that button.

If the Copy to Clipboard was not pressed, no image will be loaded into the image editor or doc file when pressing Control+V. This presents a few seconts of delay, which becomes material if you are trying to capture fleeting images, e.g. an online presentation.

Please, eradicate that [Copy to Clipboard] button and load the captures screen grab immediately into the Clipboad in the same manner as Window's Snipping Tool works.

The screenshot utility of KDE Neon is waaaaaay better.
summary: Delay does not work for selected region

description:
This app is useless in case you want to catch only part of screen and you want to edit it during catching the screenshot like in LIGHTSHOT for Windows 10, which is my case. So, long story short, I would recommend you to download Flameshot rather then this if you need such option. 

This app will offer you only two things:
- take screenshot of whole screen. But, if you have more then 1 monitors, it will not work (ubuntu 20.04)
- take only part of the screen, but you can't edit it (like add pointing arrow to what you want to show etc.)
- it will automatically save the file into your picture folder (you can't change it).

What you can't do:
- change the saving folder
- easily UNINSTALL this app
- add arrows and text and other features that FLAMESHOT supports
- change the keyboard shortcut to something else (only PrtScn and SHIFT + PrtScr works)
Can't take screenshot, "all methods failed", and can't launch from terminal to find out more. Uninstalling.

Der Programmierer hat die Standard Aufrufe des Systems zusammengefasst und graphisch umgesetzt. Die Ausführung lässt in einem sauberen System keine Zweifel aufkommen . Die Dateiausgabe im Format xx.png ist seit mehr als 40 Jahren Standard im Netz, weil es auch von exotischen Betriebssystemen gelesen werden kann. Das es jedesmal neu aufgerufen werden muß, liegt an dem automatischen Zählwerk, dessen Namen man jedoch vor abspeichern ändern könnte. Um mehrere Aufnahmen zu machen, legt man es einfach in die Favoritenleiste. Die Anwendung wurde über einige Versionen von Ubuntu nicht unterstüzt; das lag wohl an der Überarbeitung durch den Programmierer. Für mich seit vielen Jahren eine glatte 10 , oder 5 Sterne
summary: Die beschriebenen Probleme sind NICHT Fehler des Programms

分享我的软件帮助文档（有关快捷键部分）
一、截图
1、快捷键
使用以下全局快捷键，可以随时对桌面、窗口或区域进行截图：
截取全屏：Print Screen
截取窗口：Alt+Print
截取选定区域：Shift+Print Screen

使用快捷键截取的图片将自动保存到“图片”（Pictures）文件夹，文件名以“Screenshot”开头，之后缀以截图的日期和时间。
注意：如无“图片”文件夹，将保存到你的用户文件夹中。
按下Ctrl键，再按上述快捷键，可将截图直接复制到剪切板，而不是直接保存。
二、录屏
录屏：Ctrl+Alt+Shift+R
录制过程中，将在屏幕右上角(可能在顶栏上)显示一个红点。
再次按 Ctrl+Alt+Shift+R （或点击上述红点）即可结束录屏。
视频将自动保存到“视频”文件夹中，文件名以“Screencast”开头，之后缀以录屏的日期和时间。
注意：如无“视频”文件夹，将保存到你的用户文件夹中。
